message:
SYSTEM: Terminology_in_ontologies.pdf: Página 21
21
Relations between denomination and concept
• Synonymy: the quality of two or more words with the same
or similar meaning: 
– Contamination =polution; store = save a file, run =process
• Polisemy: the capacity for a word(s) or a sign to have
multiple meanings. 
–Cluster
• Homonymy: The quality of a word or group of words that
share the same spelling but have different meanings, 
usually because they have different origins:
– Desert (leave), desert (arid region)
– Bear (animal), bear (verb)
– Fluke : 
– A fish, and a flatworm
– The end parts of an anchor
– The fins on a whale’s tail. 
– A stroke of luck
speaker: SYSTEM
